question: UN paid tribute to __________ peacekeepers killed in recent attack in Congo recently.
explanation: Recently 14 United Nations Peacekeepers were killed in Congo and several others were injured. Later UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres described as the "worst attack" on UN peacekeepers or UN "blue helmets" in recent history. The mission's military, police and civilian staff were encouraged to continue their efforts to implement the operation's mandate, including the protection of civilians
